action_items.action: Extract parseToRecord helper to type-guards.ts, replace 4 JSON.parse casts in try-invoke.ts:28, try-synthesize.ts:190, try-storage.ts:97/201
action_items.impact: Eliminates 4 unsafe type assertions, centralizes JSON parsing safety
action_items.resolution: Added parseToRecord to type-guards.ts, replaced JSON.parse casts in try-invoke.ts, try-synthesize.ts, and try-storage.ts with safe validation

action_items.action: Fix install CTA in TryPageClient.tsx to use href='/#install' and change nav Install link from GitHub repo to /#install
action_items.impact: Fixes broken conversion paths at highest-intent moments
action_items.resolution: Changed TryPageClient.tsx CTA to href='/#install', changed nav Install link from external GitHub URL to internal /#install

action_items.action: Replace toLocaleString('en-US') in timeline/page.tsx:190 with locale-aware date formatting
action_items.impact: Fixes chronic i18n inconsistency across 3+ iterations
action_items.resolution: Replaced hardcoded 'en-US' with Intl.DateTimeFormat(undefined, ...) for locale-aware formatting

action_items.action: Create try-storage.test.ts with integration tests for saveWebReview, listWebReviews, getWebReview, getPreviousReviewForRepo
action_items.impact: Closes last untested module gap (254 lines)
action_items.resolution: Created try-storage.test.ts with 15 tests covering all 4 public functions plus getShareableUrl

action_items.action: Replace type assertions in boards/build/page.tsx reducer (lines 211, 255) with explicit field-by-field construction
action_items.impact: Removes 2 unsafe casts the compiler cannot verify
action_items.resolution: Replaced both 'as BuilderAgent' and 'as BuilderCriterion' casts with explicit field-by-field object construction

action_items.action: Dynamically load score_history from state.json on landing page instead of static values in messages.ts
action_items.impact: Shows real 17-iteration improvement arc instead of stale snapshots
action_items.resolution: Made HomePage async server component, imported getProjectState, displays real score_history with fallback to static data

action_items.action: Add axe-core automated WCAG testing to CI
action_items.impact: Catches accessibility regressions automatically, closes 3-iteration gap
action_items.resolution: Added jest-axe dependency, created accessibility.test.tsx with 10 axe-core tests, added explicit CI step for accessibility testing

action_items.action: Extract shared timeline rendering into TimelineEventCard component, move VERDICT_STYLES to ui-constants.ts
action_items.resolution: Created TimelineEventCard.tsx component, moved VERDICT_STYLES/VERDICT_DOT to ui-constants.ts, updated timeline/page.tsx and TimelineInline.tsx

action_items.action: Audit 28 text-gray-400 occurrences for WCAG AA contrast, replace failing instances with text-gray-300
action_items.impact: Ensures body text meets 4.5:1 contrast ratio
action_items.resolution: Fixed 10 instances of text-gray-400 on bg-gray-800 backgrounds across 7 files, improving contrast from ~3.9:1 to ~7.5:1

action_items.action: Implement adaptive effort budgets in try-invoke.ts scaling thinking tokens to content size
action_items.impact: Better utilizes Opus adaptive thinking based on repo complexity
action_items.resolution: Added getAdaptiveBudget() to try-agents.ts that scales thinking tokens 1x-1.75x based on content size, integrated into both tool-enabled and single-turn paths in try-invoke.ts

action_items.action: Create examples/demo-repo/ with before/after audit JSONs showing improvement cycle
action_items.resolution: Created examples/demo-repo/ with before-audit.json (iter 0, 68.4), after-audit.json (iter 15, 90.13), and score-progression.json showing full 17-iteration arc

action_items.action: Increase BYOK maxTotalChars from 800K to 1.2M in github.ts getTierLimits
action_items.resolution: Changed maxTotalChars from 800_000 to 1_200_000 in getTierLimits, updated test expectation
